articles.description: Analysts with IBM Security X-Force believe nation-state actors may be behind a global phishing campaign that’s targeting the COVID-19 vaccine “cold chain.”
articles.content:
Analysts arent sure whos behind the operation
Amelia Krales
A global phishing campaign has been targeting organizations associated with the distribution of COVID-19 vaccines since September 2020, I… [+3900 chars]

articles.title: Walmart is paying its workers $388 million in holiday bonuses. Critics say it's not nearly enough - CNN

articles.title: Facebook to start removing false claims about coronavirus vaccine - Daily Mail
articles.description: False claims about the jab doing the rounds on the site will be removed and expand its ban on anti-vaxx adverts to include those regarding the Covid vaccination.

Facebook will remove harmful anti-vaxx propaganda from the social media platform as the world prepares to receive the first coronavirus vaccine.
